main.description: Fullstack Web Developer and Flutter Enthusiast ðŸš€
main.bio: Passionate about creating digital experiences that blend creativity and functionality, I am a Fullstack Web Developer with a strong foundation in front-end and back-end development. But my love for coding extends beyond the web. I'm also a devoted Flutter Developer, specializing in crafting cross-platform mobile apps that are as beautiful as they are functional.

education.degree: Bachelor in Computer Science and Engineering
education.description: I have done B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering, where I acquired valuable skills in areas such as data structures, database management systems (DBMS), compiler design, and networking.

education.degree: I have completed My Higher secondary education
education.description: I have gained substantial experience during my time in school, where I acquired a diverse set of skills like MySQL and Java.

work.title: Internship
work.description: Completed Internship at Oasis Infobyte, gaining hands-on experience in web development. Proficiently utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create and enhance web pages, demonstrating a strong grasp of front-end technologies.

work.title: Internship
work.description: Completed Internship at Bharat Intern, where I acquired practical insights into web development methodologies, fostering skills that are essential for modern web development practices.

work.title: Open Source Contributor
work.description: Contributed to various open-source projects, demonstrating a commitment to the global developer community. Gained proficiency in version control systems like Git while adhering to established coding standards and best practices. Contributed code, documentation, and bug reports to open-source repositories on platforms such as GitHub, making meaningful contributions to the open-source ecosystem.

work.title: Problem Solver
work.description: Developed strong problem-solving skills through regular practice on coding platforms such as LeetCode and HackerRank. Applied knowledge gained from these platforms to real-world projects, effectively optimizing code and improving software efficiency.
